<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Describe Cron Expression"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1/integrations/templates/connections/cron/describe"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



**Requires an Access Token as the bearer token.**

Validate and describe a Quartz cron expression. Returns a human-readable description of when the schedule will run.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"x-organization-id","in":"header","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Select the working organization. Necessary since users can belong to multiple organizations.","title":"X-Organization-Id"},"description":"Select the working organization. Necessary since users can belong to multiple organizations."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"cron_expression":{"type":"string","title":"Cron Expression","description":"A Quartz cron expression to be described"}},"type":"object","required":["cron_expression"],"title":"CronExpressionDescribeRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
